name: Dark Roots
description:
Escape the roots that are chasing you to make you return to the dark root underworld. Fight off forces of nature that slow you down and upgrade your character to become more powerful than ever in this fast paced action-packed chaos-infused roguelike adventure!

Controls: displayed in game's menu.
Your goal is to survive for as long as possible. Bats, wasps and flowers are your enemies. Enemy attacks slow you down. If you get caught by the roots it's game over.

Credits:
Kacper Kowalczuk - Programming
Krzysztof Heldt - Programming
Daniel Kończyk - VFX Art
Marek Chromicz - Design
Monika Dalach - 3D Art
Lucjusz Rossed - 2D Art
